executive-summary.title: Executive Summary - Permissionless Paths
executive-summary.content: This report presents findings from a qualitative study examining sustainable open source development in the freedom tech ecosystem — an emerging field of decentralized, censorship-resistant technologies built to resist institutional capture.
executive-summary.description: Research findings on sustainable open source development in freedom tech ecosystem

core-finding.title: Core Finding - Tyranny of Permissionlessness
core-finding.content: Our core finding: the very values and features that attract developers to the Bitcoin and Nostr ecosystems — freedom as an ideal, permissionless participation, autonomy over projects — become the source of their greatest challenges.
core-finding.description: The tyranny of permissionlessness: how freedom principles create challenges for developers

study-overview.title: Study Overview - 26 Bitcoin & Nostr Contributors
study-overview.content: Between March and May 2025, we interviewed 26 Bitcoin and Nostr contributors with at least 12 months of full-time grant-funded experience.
study-overview.description: Qualitative study of 26 Bitcoin and Nostr contributors with grant-funded experience

tyranny-of-permissionlessness.title: The Tyranny of Permissionlessness
tyranny-of-permissionlessness.content: While these principles enable open innovation and resist capture, without support structures they lead developers to navigate unlimited responsibility alone.
tyranny-of-permissionlessness.description: How permissionless principles create challenges for open source developers

four-strategies.title: Four Strategies for Chaos
four-strategies.content: Four key strategies that developers use to navigate the challenges of permissionless development in open source ecosystems.
four-strategies.description: Four strategies for navigating permissionless development challenges

beyond-financial.title: Beyond Financial Sustainability
beyond-financial.content: Sustainable open source development requires more than just financial support - it needs community, recognition, and meaningful work structures.
beyond-financial.description: What sustainable open source development really requires

recommendations.title: Recommendations for Sustainable Permissionlessness
recommendations.content: This isn't inevitable: with intentional design, we can maintain permissionless participation while building sustainable work practices.
recommendations.description: How to build sustainable permissionless development practices
